discounts.discount_description: Add new discounts and drag them to the desired time.
discounts.discount_dropbox: Drag to apply the discount to all time slots on the chosen day

blocked_days.subtitle1: Customize the restaurant's weekly closing day. This option allows you to precisely set the day when the restaurant will be closed every week.
blocked_days.subtitle2: Click and drag to select closure days. Resize or delete closure blocks. Provide block titles so your customers know the reason for the closure.

blocked_times.subtitle1: Restrict reservations for specific time slots on the selected day, weekly.
blocked_times.subtitle2: Manage reservation restrictions for specific time slots on a particular date.
